ai-tha-ap306:1.2_0: were so awakening to the Great Bodhi,
ai-tha-ap306:1.4_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap306:2.1_0: At that time the Fortunate One
ai-tha-ap306:2.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap306:3.4_0: he made the population of people.
ai-tha-ap306:4.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap306:5.2_0: When I heard the teaching they directed
ai-tha-ap306:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap306:6.2_0: I was the one great hermit.
ai-tha-ap306:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uttiya.
ai-tha-ap306:9.1_0: The Elder Dhammadinnā was the fourth,
